item.description:
The movie: Buena Vista Social Club & the live music: by Tierra Mestiza , Friday Aug 15, 2008 at 7:30 p.m.

We can meet a little early at 7:15 to find seats together.

Join us for Live Music and a Special Outdoor Movie Screening at the Billings Forge Courtyard. The movie and music are presented by the Wadsworth Atheneum in collaboration with Billings Forge at their courtyard at Broad Street and Capital Avenue (adjacent to the Firebox Restaurant, 539 Broad St, Hartford, CT, 06106). Enjoy a free live music performance by Carlos Hernandez Chavez of Tierra Mestiza playing traditional South American music, which begins at 7:30 p.m. The movie Buena Vista Social Club is about aging Cuban musicians who are brought out of retirement, resulting in triumphant performances of extraordinary music. 1999. USA. 105 min. Rated G. English/Spanish. (Documentary)

Questions? Contact Karen: 860-922-7997 (cell)
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear a jean jacket as in my photo.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Traditional South American music & movie, the Buena Vista Social Club - gratis!
